name: 冬冬
greetingText: I'm really lucky to meet you!
wishText: I hope you have all the good things ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you! Feliz Navidad...
text2: That's what I was going to say to you.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Happy Birthday, I love you forever!
outroText: Okay, now come and give me a kiss.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
